name: Order Financing
description: Financing to support the purchase of goods before order fulfillment.
eligibility_criteria: Must have an established business with over 2 years of operation.

name: Micro Leasing
description: Leasing of equipment and micro-assets to small businesses.
eligibility_criteria: Business must be operational for at least 1 year.

name: Consumer Loan
description: Loans provided to consumers for personal use.

name: Microfinance Agriculture Loan
description: Loans designed to support small-scale farmers.
eligibility_criteria: Must own or lease agricultural land.

name: Microfinance Loan
description: General purpose loans for microbusiness activities.
eligibility_criteria: Operational business with no outstanding debts.

name: Short to Medium Term Loans
description: Loans with terms from 1 to 5 years for SMEs.
eligibility_criteria: Active business with profit for last 2 fiscal years.
